subject: I am Jastro Finey
body:
I am Jastro Finey
From the UK
Read below;
As of now.
There is a contract opportunity to supply raw materials to my Employers.
The company needs specific raw materials.
 
You can gain from the  profit share if you can bring in a capable person that can handle the contract  supply of the raw material from the USA to the UK.
10% of the profit margin will be paid to you as your commission .
This will not disturb your job with your company.
Only to connect a capable contractor
The farmer of the raw material herbal plant is in the USA and the end user company is in the UK.
The contractor can bridge the gap to source from the farmer and sell at a profit margin to the end user company.
Will you be able to connect a trustworthy and reliable contractor that will not (betray me and you) if we link him up to such a contract opportunity?
Or do you have the competency to handle such directly?
we can share the profit at 40/60%  between us.
I can explain further if interested.
The first supply is expected to earn us over 6 million USD profit.
This is privileged information.
As an Employee of the company. I can not be a contractor or supplier to my employers.
I will send further details via your direct email if you are interested in this offer.
Thanks
Jastro Finey.

subject: Re: I am Jastro Finey
body:
Dear Jastro Finey,

Thank you for your email and the business proposal. I am intrigued by the opportunity, however, I would need more information before making a decision.

Could you please provide more details about the raw material that needs to be supplied? Also, it would be helpful to know more about the terms of the contract, such as duration and delivery expectations.

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Amber

subject: OFFER TO SUPPLY
body:
Dear Friend.

Greetings and best compliments of the season to you.

I hope this email finds you well.

Following your contact connection on google, I am interested to share a
contract opportunity with you for partnership consideration towards earning
legitimate brokers fees or commission.

Can you handle international contract supply of raw materials to an end
user company? Or can you be able to bring a trustworthy competent person to
handle such a contract for you to earn 10% on net profit share commission
benefit fee?

I shall provide you with further details if you are interested in receiving
such a proposal to study further to take appropriate action to benefit from
the contract opportunity.

I look forward to your response.
Regards
Thanks
Supervisor.
